snippet: With the Philippines and China at odds over territorial claims in the Pacific, the United States is stepping up its military support for Manila.
abstract: United States is negotiating deal to allow it to position military equipment and rotate more personnel into Philippines while avoiding contentious issue of re-establishing American bases in country; stepped up military support for Manila comes amid simmering tensions between Philippines and China over areas in South China Sea claimed by both countries.
lead_paragraph: With the Philippines and China at odds over territorial claims in the Pacific, the United States is stepping up its military support for Manila.

headline.main: U.S. Seeks Expanded Role for Military in Philippines
headline.print_headline: U.S. Seeks Expanded Role For Military in Philippines

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
